channel.title: Comments on: Podcast 3: Dr. Waldron’s December 2010 trip to England

item.title: By: William Wilson
item.dc:creator: William Wilson
item.description: Dear Dr Samuel Walderon it was a great plesure in meeting you at the WestMinister Conference on Tuesday and also for you to sign your book the 1689 Confession of Faith.I do hope that your paper was well recieved and you got alot of Questions. Every blessing and may the Lord Continue to give you health and strength as you teach at Midwest Centre for Theology and your Preaching of Gods Words Yours in his true Grace of our Lord. William H.T.C.Student
item.content:encoded:
Dear Dr Samuel Walderon it was a great plesure in meeting you at the WestMinister Conference on Tuesday and also for you to sign your book the 1689 Confession of Faith.I do hope that your paper was well recieved and you got alot of Questions.
Every blessing and may the Lord Continue to give you health and strength as you teach at Midwest Centre for Theology and your Preaching of Gods Words
Yours in his true Grace of our Lord.
William H.T.C.Student

item.title: By: Richard Barcellos
item.dc:creator: Richard Barcellos
item.description: The paper is scheduled to be published in two venues - in a book with the other West. Conf. papers and in Reformed Baptist Theological Review (www.rbtr.org).
item.content:encoded: The paper is scheduled to be published in two venues – in a book with the other West. Conf. papers and in Reformed Baptist Theological Review (www.rbtr.org).

item.title: By: Jon Hueni
item.dc:creator: Jon Hueni
item.description: Dr. Waldron, You're scratching where I itch. This was the question that I was left desiring more clarity upon after reading your thesis on Faith, Obedience, and Justification. I too would like to know if I could purchase a copy of this Westminster paper. Thank you for your continuing clarity in writing. Jon Hueni
item.content:encoded:
Dr. Waldron,
You’re scratching where I itch. This was the question that I was left desiring more clarity upon after reading your thesis on Faith, Obedience, and Justification. I too would like to know if I could purchase a copy of this Westminster paper.
Thank you for your continuing clarity in writing.
Jon Hueni

item.title: By: Chris Cullnane
item.dc:creator: Chris Cullnane
item.description: Dr. Waldron, How can I get a copy of your paper? Thanks, Chris Cullnane
item.content:encoded:
Dr. Waldron,
How can I get a copy of your paper?
Thanks,
Chris Cullnane
